name: Product Hunt Wrapped 2025
tagline: Your 2025 maker journey, visualized.
description: 2025 was a massive year for makers. You shipped, hunted, and climbed the leaderboards now see the data. Product Hunt Wrapped generates a cinematic summary of your year. Just paste your Developer Token to reveal: üöÄ Launch DNA: Your total products and upvotes. üåç Global Ranking: Where you stand in the yearly top 1000. üé≠ Maker Persona: Are you a Blitzscaler, Legend, or Apex Hunter? ‚ú® Visual Story: A dynamic walkthrough of your 2025 wins. Find your rank.

name: Memingo
tagline: Let AI Make the Memes for You, Create & Share Instantly
description: Memingo was made for those moments when you have a funny idea but no time to think of the perfect caption. It automatically generates captions that actually make sense. Create viral memes fast, tweak them your way, and you‚Äôre done. Everything is saved securely on your device only. No accounts, no uploads, no watermarks.

name: ZapZipped
tagline: Your WhatsApp groups, wrapped - now with DNA & top moments
description: ZapZipped is an AI-powered WhatsApp Wrapped for your group chats. Get fun stats, awards, emojis, and now Group DNA ‚Äî the shared personality of your group ‚Äî plus the top conversations of the year. Private by design, easy to share, and now available in English, Portuguese, German, Italian, and Spanish.

name: Alpie Core
tagline: A 4-bit reasoning model with frontier-level performance
description: Alpie Core is a 32B reasoning model trained, fine-tuned, and served entirely at 4-bit precision. Built with a reasoning-first design, it delivers strong performance in multi-step reasoning and coding while using a fraction of the compute of full-precision models. Alpie Core is open source, OpenAI-compatible, supports long context, and is available via Hugging Face, Ollama, and a hosted API for real-world use.

name: Xteink X4
tagline: Ultra light, magnetic E-reader that attaches to your phone
description: Meet Xteink X4, the palm-sized eReader with magnetic back. Just 74g and 4.9mm thin, it delivers a paper-like reading experience in a minimalist design. Snap it, carry it, and read anywhere‚Äîperfect for modern readers on the go.

name: IGC Loyalty, Create a treasure hunt
tagline: Place personalized digital hearts/ treasures via the APP map
description: Send a Heart is a C2C campaign that lets anyone place a personalised digital heart anywhere in the world. Users start with 20 free points and can customise names or messages on pop-ups. With over 125,000 hearts and treasures placed, it‚Äôs gaining strong engagement. Businesses can also use it to create simple treasure hunts and promotions, sharing clues via the Clue Page or a unique URL.

name: Kandle - Chart Insights
tagline: Technical analysis from a chart image‚Äînothing else needed.
description: Most trading tools assume you need charts, data feeds, and indicators set up first. Kandle works differently. You upload an image of a candlestick chart‚Äîscreenshots, TradingView charts, or photos‚Äîand get clear technical analysis in seconds. If indicators are already visible on the chart, Kandle considers them in the insight. It explains trend, structure, key levels, and possible scenarios in plain language‚Äîbuilt for fast clarity, not more dashboards.

name: Year in Code
tagline: Spotify Wrapped for your claude coding year!
description: Year in Code turns your Claude Code usage into beautiful year-in-review reports. See your total tokens, activity streaks, and top models used. Setup takes 2 minutes with just one ccusage command. Key features: ‚úì Beautiful Wrapped-style design ‚úì Free forever & open source ‚úì 2-minute setup ‚úì Save/Share on socials Perfect for Claude Code users who want to visualize their AI coding activity and costs (soon).

name: Leo Recovery
tagline: All-in-one recovery platform for addicts and their families
description: Leo Recovery is more than a sobriety counter ‚Äî it's a complete recovery platform. What makes it different: ‚Ä¢ Background audio player for speaker stories and meditations ‚Ä¢ AI companion that understands addiction context (not generic advice) ‚Ä¢ 15+ psychological tools: emotion diary, drama triangle, relapse radar ‚Ä¢ Separate paths for addicts and their loved ones ‚Ä¢ Video content and daily motivation Built by a team with personal recovery experience. Free, no ads.

name: BloodMate
tagline: Request blood instantly from your contacts and nearby donors
description: BloodMate connects patients with verified blood donors instantly by activating their personal contacts and extended network within seconds. Unlike traditional donor apps that rely only on databases, BloodMate spreads requests through real human connections, increasing response speed and trust. Built by developers who witnessed critical delays firsthand, BloodMate exists for one reason: to save lives when every second matters.

name: rep+
tagline: Your AI security copilot for HTTP requests.
description: rep+ is a lightweight Chrome DevTools extension inspired by Burp Suite's Repeater, now supercharged with AI. I often need to poke at a few requests without spinning up the full Burp stack, so I built this extension to keep my workflow fast, focused, and intelligent with integrated LLM support.

name: EmojiToPNG - Emoji to image converter
tagline: Convert any emoji to a high-resolution PNG
description: EmojiToPNG.com lets you download any emoji as a clean, high-resolution PNG with a transparent background. Built for real usage, not just reference or copy-paste. Export large, crisp emoji images in one click, no signup, no paywall, no friction. Each emoji has its own page with descriptions and related emojis, making it easy to find, download, and use emojis in designs, docs, or web projects.

name: Blacksmith
tagline: AI powered penetration testing
description: BlacksmithAI is an OPEN-SOURCE advanced penetration testing framework that leverages multiple AI agents to automate security assessments. The system orchestrates specialized agents through a complete penetration testing lifecycle from reconnaissance to post-exploitation using professional security tools in a controlled environment.

name: AIConstruct Hub
tagline: The Best Engineering & Construction AI Tools Directory..
description: AI Construct Hub is a comprehensive digital directory and resource platform specifically curated for artificial intelligence tools in the construction industry. The site creates a comprehensive category for the apps to help professionals stay updated on emerging technologies. It serves as a central hub for contractors and engineers to discover, compare, and implement AI-driven solutions to improve project efficiency and safety.

name: Reader Directory
tagline: Cut through the noise. Find newsletters that matter.
description: Most newsletter directories are outdated or filled with spam. Reader Directory is different. Curated - every newsletter is manually reviewed before listing. AI search - find newsletters by intent, not just keywords. Try "crypto for beginners" or "weekly design inspiration." SEO + LLM optimized - listings rank on Google and surface in ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity. Rich profiles - screenshots, subscriber counts, sample issues. Free - submit and get listed-

name: Teromi
tagline: Teromi - AI CFO
description: Teromi is an AI-powered CFO for startups and small businesses that automates the entire financial function. The platform builds financial models, forecasts cash flow, runs scenarios, and detects risks in advance. Unlike traditional FP&A tools, Teromi doesn‚Äôt just display data - it recommends concrete business decisions. This makes CFO-level financial intelligence accessible, simple, and affordable for any company.

name: PingChore
tagline: Warn customers before bad weather ruins the day
description: PingChore helps weather dependent service businesses give customers a heads up before bad weather hits. From event planning, mobile auto detailing to landscaping, rain and storms often cause last minute cancellations, frustrated customers, and a lot of manual texting. PingChore watches the weather for your jobs and sends a simple message when conditions are likely to cause issues, so customers are not surprised and rescheduling happens earlier. No dashboards to babysit. No daily planning.

name: Prezz
tagline: AI app that creates full presentations in seconds
description: Create fire presentations in seconds with Prezz AI. Your ideas ‚Üí stunning slides. No cap. üß† AI content generation ‚Äî text, bullet points, structure, even stats üé® Ready-made styles ‚Äî Corporate, Creative, Minimal Dark, Academic üñºÔ∏è AI images for each slide üìä Auto charts (bar, pie, line) when needed ‚úèÔ∏è Drag & drop canvas editor to tweak everything üìÑ Export to PDF or PowerPoint

name: QuestSteps
tagline: Use AI to break down your tasks into a pixel adventure!
description: QuestSteps breaks down overwhelming tasks into tiny, manageable micro-steps with AI. Gamified productivity app for focus, task organization, and getting things done.

name: CrackIt Ai
tagline: Get Your Dream Job
description: CrackIt AI - AI-powered career success platform for job preparation, resume building, mock interviews, and skill development
